quotes.text: Action will delineate and define you.
I play to win, whether during practice or a real game.
Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.
I don't know where I'm going, but I'm on my way.
I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
I start where the last man left off.
You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
The perfect is the enemy of the good.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
At the age of six I wanted to be a cook. At seven I wanted to be Napoleon. And my ambition has been growing steadily ever since.
If you want to change the world, start with the next person who comes to you in need
Without fear, you'd never survive.
In theory there is no difference between theory and practice. In practice there is.
There will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
Stop waiting for things to happen and instead make them happen.
Amateurs practice until they get it right. Professionals practice until they can't get it wrong.
You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
I'm as proud of what we don't do as I am of what we do.
When the task is done beforehand, then it is easy
Do, or do not. There is no try.
Awareness is the greatest agent for change.
Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
To infinity and beyond!
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
One can have no smaller or greater mastery than mastery of oneself.
We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
To be idle is a short road to death and to be dilligent is a way of life.
If you want a thing done well, do it yourself.
Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.
I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
When you stop doing things for fun you might as well be dead
Limit everything to the essential but do not remove the poetry
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, It is the only thing that ever has.
Today, you can decide to walk in freedom. You can choose to walk differently. You can walk as a free person, enjoying every step.
This is the real secret of life - to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
Good design is as little design as possible.
Give me six hours to chop a tree, I will spend the first four sharpening my axe.
Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in a long-shot.
Sometimes you never realize the value of a moment until it becomes a memory
It is the mark of an educated mind, to entertain a thought without accepting it
Another flaw in the human character is that everyone wants to build and nobody wants to do maintenance.
A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not why ships are built.
There are 1,000 lessons in defeat, but only one in victory
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
But you don't become great by trying to be great. You become great by wanting to do something, and doing it so hard that you become great in the process.
In the depths of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer
Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not.
Today you are you, this is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.
Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing, and you'll never be criticized.
The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing
Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
Treat the earth well. It was not given to you by your parents, it was loaned to you by your children.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Stay hungry, stay foolish.
